title: Why does Spell Vamp still exist as a stat?
body:
Neither Will of the Ancients nor Hextech Gunblade actually give you Spell Vamp anymore- the only item that does so is a component of those. It seems a bit odd to have a stat that can only be granted by runes, a component item, or Akali's passive. I'd say to just change the way champs with build in SV work and change the Hextech Revolver.
Does this not make sense?

> [{quoted}](name=regaline,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5NGrqzkE,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-02-08T23:06:29.148+0000)
>

{{item:3070}} {{champion:25}} {{item:3070}}
Why does Morgana of all people have that passive anyway?

Why does Nasus have life steal?


Because they are both old champs who, in that time, were not given 'interesting/cool/interactive' passives like champs have now, but just flat stats. Look at most 450/1350 champ passives.
Back when passives were passives and champs had only 1.

Nasus's makes sense. He's someone that wants to just farm through the early game so he can get stacks and his passive helps mitigate harass he gets. Morgana is a mage that prefers to fish for Q's and then go all in with W and ult. She doesn't get much harass and even though her ult requires her to go into close range, he abilities are on too long a cooldown for her to heal up from all the damage she'd take when going into range with her ult since she'd probably have blown everything before using it.

Morgana was the Safe Mage of Midlane way before becoming a support, and the passive helps with that _a lot_. In fact she only became a support because the tanky engage CC bot supports were rampart and they needed a counter.

The spell vamp is surprisingly useful for Morgana at all stages of the game. Early on when you w the waves or poke the enemies with q especially, it translates into a LOT of free sustain. Later on it keeps Morgana topped off in Poke Wars, if you don't have flash you usually take 'some' residual damage before you get your proper ult off, and 'definitely' for the second half of your ulti while you're in Zhoynas Land. Also, with max cdr your Q-W rotation is 6-7 ish seconds, which you can reasonably get off twice in a fight.

This doesn't grant spell vamp only increases your spell vamp by 20%.

0 x 0.2 = 0 

The item grants no spell vamp until you already have spell vamp.

I think it would be 1.2. 10 x 0.2 = 2
And who would want a stat decrease?

IMO, riot needs to make this stat more rewarding. Make actual items that give some type of incentive for mages to build more spell vamp over something else. This is a healthy way to promote build diversity because I can see spell vamp being used as a way for mages to stay alive longer in a fight, thus it could be very good on ap champions with low cld spells.

Part of the problem was back when {{champion:103}}  built it as a core build.  It was impossible to push them out of lane.  Same problem with {{champion:25}} she would cast Tormented Soil once or twice and get back half her HP.  It really made some champs a nightmare to push out of lane.
